sources.title: He Took Hostages Inside a Church | Forgiven | Full Faith-Based Thriller Movie
sources.description:
He Took Hostages Inside a Church | Forgiven | Full Faith-Based Thriller Movie

When a police standoff with Lieutenant Morgan (Kevin Sorbo) leads to a hostage situtation inside a church, Elizabeth (Jenn Gotzon), the pastor's daughter puts her fear aside in a bid to save the James' (Casey Fuller) life.

2016.  Stars: Kevin Sorbo, Jenn Gotzon, Casey Fuller
